0.title: AH-6M Little Bird: The Killer Egg
0.description: A special forces helicopter originating from the commercial model offers mind-blowing agility and a lethal arsenal of weapons!

1.title: USS Nevada (BB-36): Cutting the Edge
1.description: USS Nevada is the lead ship of her class of two battleships built for the U.S. Navy in the years prior to the outbreak of WWI. Featuring a plethora of naval innovations and setting a standard for coming U.S. battleships, captains in War Thunder will have the chance to take command of the iconic USS Nevada as it arrives in the game as part of the next major update!

2.title: Pre-order: USS CA-134 Des Moines 1948 heavy cruiser
2.description: A fast-firing Premium heavy cruiser, the USS Des Moines is available for pre-order as a special pack with Golden Eagles, Premium days and unique customization options!

0.title: World War Mode news
0.description: We would like to present to you the next batch of changes in the “World War” game mode and inform you about the upcoming opportunity to test your skill in historical battles.

1.title: Pages of History (February)
1.description: For the whole month, you will have 8 tasks available to you one by one. Completion of each task will award you with a trophy containing a reward, while completing all tasks will award you with a unique in-game player icon

2.title: Pages of History (January)
2.description: For the whole month, you will have 8 tasks available to you one by one. Completion of each task will award you with a trophy containing a reward, while completing all tasks will award you with a unique in-game player icon

0.title: War Thunder "Apex Predators" - Changelog
0.description: Brand new Rank VIII 4th generation aircraft with the iconic trio of F-16, MiG-29 and Tornado! Selection of over 40 new and updated models of aircraft, ground vehicles and navy. New models for ship crew with reworked voice overs for navy events, drop-tanks mechanics, two new locations and as always, a long list of bug fixes and smaller updates and changes! Prepare yourself, Apex Predators have arrived at War Thunder!

1.title: Update  2.23.1.41
1.description: MiG-21 F-13 — ballistic calculator has been added for rockets. (...)

2.title: Update 2.23.1.33 (Xbox, Playstation - Server update)
2.description: The chance of radar lock transfer on nearby targets has been decreased, which means more stable target tracking.
